channel.title: Blogs on uozu
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on uozu

item.title: How this site is built
item.description: I currently use hugo to generate the site content from markdown. The content is deployed and maintained using netlify. To do favicon check: rss reader can read site? check: lighthouse report proof read any tools to automate? spelling, grammar, consistency (eg. capitalisation) update publish date & filename merge to main & publish Generating the site content with Hugo Here’s what I want in a blogging tool, and how Hugo provides.
